full_summary:
======================
### Hospitality Service RFP

#### Invitation to Bid

The Government of Canada has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a Hospitality service for the Department of National Defence. The service must be located at a 25 km radius from the Valcartier Support Base in Quebec, Canada.

#### Service Details

The successful bid will provide a Hospitality service from May 2023 to August 2023, with an optional accommodation service available from August 2023 to September 2023.

#### Procedures

* The RFP has been amended to extend the closing time to 2 PM EDT on March 13, 2023.
* All supporting documents and bid submissions must be received by 2 PM EDT on March 13, 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

#### RFP Details

* RFP Title: W0106-22J027 Hospitality Service - RFP
* Reference Number: WS3869824917-Doc3869884551
* Solicitation Number: WS3869824917
* Publication Date: February 13, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 13, 2023 (2 PM EDT)
* Expected Contract Dates:
	+ Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
	+ Expected Contract End Date: October 27, 2023
* RFP Status: Expired

#### Bid Evaluation Criteria

The lowest price will be the determining factor in the evaluation of bids.

#### Opportunities and Restrictions

This RFP is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The RFP is open to suppliers who can meet the requirements and provide the necessary services.

#### Contact Information

For more information on this RFP, please contact:

Melanie Caty, PSPC
Email: [melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### CPTPP Trade Agreement

This RFP is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), which includes the following countries:

* Australia
* Brunei
* Canada
* Chile
* Japan
* Malaysia
* Mexico
* New Zealand
* Peru
* Singapore
* Vietnam

#### WTO GPA Trade Agreement
